import styles from "../styles/Enquiry.module.css"; import ImageUpload from "./ImageUpload"; let name = document.getElementById("customerName"); let email = document.getElementById("customerEmail"); let phoneNum = document.getElementById("customerPhone"); let carMake = document.getElementById("carMake"); let carModel = document.getElementById("carModel"); let carYear = document.getElementById("carYear"); let idle = document.getElementsByName("idle")[0]; function EnquiryForm() { document .querySelector(".enquiryForm") .addEventListener("submit", function (e) { e.preventDefault(); }); return (
); } export default EnquiryForm;
